SEARCH
Package article

Class Article

java.lang.Object
article.Article
public class Article extends Object
The soul of the project. Articles scraped from the internet will be contained here

  • Field Details

    • id

      public static int id
      This id should not be accessed anywhere else in the code. If you want to get the ID of the article, use ownID instead

      The original URL to the article

  • Method Details

    • updateTotalArticle

      public static void updateTotalArticle()
      Write the total number of articles to the total.info file

    • getTotalArticle

      public static int getTotalArticle()
      Set the counter to the one saved in file
      Returns:
      int: the total number of articles saved in the database

    • saveToJSON

      public void saveToJSON() throws Exception
      Save current article to JSON file. Use the static id for file name
      Throws:
      Exception

    • readFromJSON

      public static Article readFromJSON(int id) throws Exception
      Read an article from JSON file with corresponding id
      Parameters:
      id - the id of article to be read
      Returns:
      an Article object: the article read from JSON file
      Throws:
      Exception

    • loadAllArticle

      public static Vector<Article> loadAllArticle() throws Exception
      Read all articles from database, write to a vector of article
      Returns:
      A Vector of all articles have ever been saved
      Throws:
      Exception
